architectural_notes: Road scenes use video elements with autoplay and loop attributes
One road video has CSS filter for darkening to simulate night drive

existing_features.title: Replace all road scene background images in frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts with the uploaded video files, ensuring each of the four road journey segments (morning, sunset, evening, night) uses the appropriate uploaded video as its background source
Configure all road scene videos to loop continuously and autoplay when displayed in the TravelVideoScene component
Apply a darkening filter to one of the road scene videos to create a night drive effect, selecting the video based on the story flow progression (likely the evening or night segment)
Preserve the existing click behavior on road scene videos so that clicking on the video advances the journey as it currently does with static images

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace road scene images with videos that loop and autoplay
Darken one road video for night drive effect based on story flow
Maintain current click behavior on road scene videos

projectName: Replace road scene images with autoplay videos and add night drive effect
